entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
